00045 // Macros & Defines

00050 typedef enum {MAC_EVENT_RX=0x10,               
00051               MAC_EVENT_ACK,                   
00052               MAC_EVENT_NACK,                  
00053               MAC_EVENT_ACCESS,                
00054               MAC_EVENT_SCAN,                  
00055               MAC_EVENT_BEACON_REQ,            
00056               MAC_EVENT_TIMER,                 
00057               MAC_EVENT_ASSOCIATION_REQUEST,   
00058               MAC_EVENT_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE,  
00059               MAC_EVENT_ROUTE,                 
00060 } __attribute__((packed)) event_t;
00061 
00065 typedef struct {
00066     event_t event;  
00067     u8 *data;       
00068 } __attribute__((packed)) event_object_t;
00069
